error.invalid_link: Server returned an empty response. This usually means the MapShare link name is not valid. Make sure you can successfully visit this map at: https://share.garmin.com/LINK_NAME_HERE

notify.name: Send message to InReach
notify.description: Send a message to InReach devices via MapShare

message.name: Message
message.description: The message to send to the InReach device

target.name: Target
target.description: Device name, display name, or IMEI to send the message to. If not specified, sends to all devices.

from_addr.name: From Address
from_addr.description: The sender address that will appear on the InReach device
